items.title: SCORE - Transparent Relevance
items.author: System
items.excerpt: Every item shows its relevance score from 0-100. No hidden algorithms, no engagement tricks. You see exactly why content is ranked the way it is. High signal, low noise.

items.title: TRACE - Full Provenance
items.author: System
items.excerpt: Know exactly where your content comes from. Track the origin of stories, see how they spread, understand the full chain from source to your feed. No mystery, no manipulation.

items.title: DEDUP - Smart Duplicate Detection
items.author: System
items.excerpt: See the same story once, not fifty times. Semantic deduplication clusters similar content and shows you the best version. Your time is valuable.

items.title: MUTE - You Control the Filter
items.author: System
items.excerpt: Powerful topic and source filtering that you control. Hide what you don't want without algorithms deciding for you. Your feed, your rules.
